name: Moccoletti
description:
On the night of the carnival, the ancient tradition of the Moccoletti is revived: snuff out the candles of every other player, before having your own extinguished!

A game by Jean and Mira, with special thanks to Fed <3

Moccoletti is a 2 - 4-player arena game with 5 selectable weapons and 4 different character designs. It was made for the 2022 GGS Winter Game Jam, by students of the Game Design Department, University of Uppsala.

The game only supports controllers.

Music from: https://www.epidemicsound.com/track/Q2c6clDXGw/
